page.title: 10 Village Organisations.
page.content: There are organisations in the village to suit every interest.Many of these are connected to the churches.For instance,the church has a good choir and a team of campanologists;there is a sunday school and a Mothers' union. The Great Central Railway Enthusiasts Club meets in the social club on the second Wednesday in every month to see films and slides of steam locomotives and to talk generally about the age of steam.For the young there are Girl Guides and Brownies,Scouts and Cubs. A History Society was formed 30 years ago.It has aroused a great deal of interest in the village.Meetings are held once a month in the community centre and usually attract some 30 people.Subjects include archaeology, antiques,Roman coins etc.as well as local History.Visits to places of interest are arranged.
